local_intent: Execute pinch grasp on grape using precomputed grasp pose, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'grasp_grape' already computed and valid
Grape is reachable and free of obstructions
coherence_with_global: Matches grasp phase of GLOBAL_BT: PoseAvailable -> MoveAbove grape -> ApproachAndAlign -> Pick(grasp_grape,1200) -> IsGraspStable.
